name: Yosia
bio_1: I'm aliased as Yosia at work.
bio_2: I'm a learner, builder, and freedom seeker.
bio_4: I was born in the beautiful Jakarta City.
bio_5: My first programming language I learned was Java.
bio_7: I'm focusing on working with data and machine learning.
bio_8: I work mostly with ML, tensorflow technologies.
bio_16: I love playing video games, Cities Skylines is my favorite one.
bio_start_coding: I started learning to code in 2020 and have been hooked ever since.
bio_first_job: I havent worked yet, searching for one.
bio_passion: I have a passion for ML, Data Science and App Development.
bio_blog_purpose: I started this blog to document and share my knowledge & experience.
lost_message: Anooo onisan, it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.
